thread.title: Distinct Software Solutions Adds 130 New Courses to Golf18 Network, One of the Golf Industry's Top Third Party Tee Time Distribution Web Sites
thread.title_full: Distinct Software Solutions Adds 130 New Courses to Golf18 Network, One of the Golf Industry's Top Third Party Tee Time Distribution Web Sites

title: Distinct Software Solutions Adds 130 New Courses to Golf18 Network, One of the Golf Industry's Top Third Party Tee Time Distribution Web Sites
text:
SOURCE: Distinct Software Solutions August 26, 2015 14:33 ET Distinct Software Solutions Adds 130 New Courses to Golf18 Network, One of the Golf Industry's Top Third Party Tee Time Distribution Web Sites 
AUSTIN, TX --(Marketwired - August 26, 2015) - Distinct Software Solutions announced today that 130 new courses have been added to Golf18 Network, the company's industry-leading third party tee time distribution web site. All of these courses have been added since July, joining Golf18 Network's exciting, always-growing portfolio of courses spread across all 50 states. 
"We work hard each week to expand Golf18 Network, and we're always adding exciting new courses," said Boots Crossley, executive vice president of sales with Distinct Software Solutions. "We are pleased that since July, 130 new courses have joined Golf18 Network. Our resources and existing audience will now allow these courses to put tee times in front of a vast number of golfers across the country, all while maintaining control of the times and prices they offer." 
Golf18 Network is a constantly-expanding third party tee time distribution web site, and it allows courses to put their tee times in front of millions of players nationwide. Golf18 Network also allows participating courses to select the times and prices of rounds they offer. The end goal of Golf18 Network is to foster a course-friendly network that promotes the games of golf and enables players to visit courses they might not have otherwise been aware of. 
Visit Golf18 Network on the web at www.golf18network.com . 
Visit Distinct Software Solutions on the web at www.distinctsoftwaresolutions.com . 
For more information contact Distinct Software Solutions at 512-236-0060. Contact Information
